hero.main_subtitle: Explore the world's most beautiful destinations with our premium travel packages

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common questions about our tours, booking process, and travel requirements.

booking.question: How do I book a tour?
booking.answer: Booking is easy! Simply browse our available tours, select your preferred dates, and complete the online booking form. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details. For custom tours, contact us directly and we'll create a personalized itinerary for you.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We offer flexible cancellation policies. You can cancel up to 48 hours before your tour for a full refund. Cancellations made 24-48 hours before departure receive a 50% refund. Unfortunately, we cannot provide refunds for same-day cancellations due to operational costs.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), bank transfers, and PayPal. For group bookings, we also accept corporate payments. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your protection.

groupSize.question: What is the maximum group size?
groupSize.answer: Our standard group tours accommodate 8-15 people to ensure a personalized experience. Private tours can be arranged for any group size, from solo travelers to large groups of 50+ people. We can also organize corporate events and special occasions.

whatToBring.question: What should I bring on the tour?
whatToBring.answer: We recommend comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing, a camera, sunscreen, and a water bottle. For specific tours, we'll provide a detailed packing list. All necessary equipment for activities is included in the tour price.

weather.question: What if the weather is bad?
weather.answer: We monitor weather conditions closely and will modify itineraries if necessary for safety. Most of our tours operate in light rain, but we may reschedule or offer alternative indoor activities during severe weather. Your safety and comfort are our top priorities.

safety.question: Are your tours safe?
safety.answer: Absolutely! All our guides are certified and experienced professionals. We follow strict safety protocols, maintain first aid equipment, and have emergency procedures in place. We're fully licensed and insured, and we regularly update our safety standards to ensure the highest level of protection.

customization.question: Can I customize my tour?
customization.answer: Yes! We specialize in creating custom tours tailored to your interests, schedule, and budget. Whether you want to focus on history, culture, nature, or adventure, our team will design the perfect itinerary for you. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements.

faq.contact_text_1: Still have questions? We're here to help!
faq.contact_text_2: Contact us for any inquiries or assistance.

special-tour.heading: Top Travel Destinations
special-tour.subheading: Discover our most popular and breathtaking destinations

astana.title: One-Day Private Tour in Astana
astana.description: Experience the modern capital of Kazakhstan with its stunning architecture, including the iconic Baiterek Tower and the futuristic cityscape.

samarkand.title: Historic Samarkand Discovery
samarkand.description: Journey through the ancient Silk Road city, exploring magnificent mosques, mausoleums, and the legendary Registan Square.

bukhara.title: Bukhara Cultural Heritage Tour
bukhara.description: Immerse yourself in the rich history of Bukhara, visiting ancient madrasas, bazaars, and architectural masterpieces.

services.heading: Our Services
services.subheading: We provide exceptional services to our clients, from transportation to accommodation and guided tours. We also offer group tours and custom itineraries.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: We offer comprehensive transportation solutions including flights, car rentals, and private transfers to ensure comfortable and convenient travel throughout your journey.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: From luxury hotels to traditional guesthouses, we provide carefully selected accommodations that match your preferences and budget for an authentic experience.

guided_tours.title: Guided Tours
guided_tours.description: Our expert local guides provide insightful tours of historical sites, cultural landmarks, and hidden gems, offering deep cultural understanding and memorable experiences.

cultural_experience.title: Cultural Experience
cultural_experience.description: Immerse yourself in local traditions, cuisine, and customs through authentic cultural experiences, workshops, and interactions with local communities.
